title: 820-2330 no ethernet / not recognized
message:
I´m working on the 820-2330 board where ethernet is not recognized. When i plug the ethernet cable in it´s not showing ethernet (message: no ethernet cable plugged in)

any ideas?

title: 820-2330 no ethernet / not recognized
message: Measure between pin 1 and 2, 3 and 6, 4 and 5 of LAN connector for continuity. But who the hell uses LAN, I never bother to fix this crap.

title: 820-2330 no ethernet / not recognized
message: All lines checked. There is continuity.

title: 820-2330 no ethernet / not recognized
message: Measure all pins the resistance to GND.

title: 820-2330 no ethernet / not recognized
message:
All Pins meassured and showing OL
​

title: 820-2330 no ethernet / not recognized
message: That is all ok, I dunno, I doubt this is worth fixing. Could be a crappy connector verify the same measurements on the other end of a cable plugged in.
